#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<vector>
#define MOD 1000000007
using namespace std;

int countpath(vector< vector<int> > mat,int R,int C)
{
	int count[R][C];
	memset(count,0,sizeof(count));
	for(int i=0;i<C;i++)
	if(mat[0][i]==0)
	break;
    else
	count[0][i]=1;
	for(int j=0;j<R;j++)
	if(mat[j][0]==0)
	break;
	else
	count[j][0]=1;
	for(int i=1;i<R;i++)
	{
		for(int j=1;j<C;j++)
		{
			if(mat[i][j]==0)
			continue;
			
			else
			{
				count[i][j]=((count[i-1][j])%MOD+(count[i][j-1])%MOD)%MOD;
			}
		}
	}
	

	
	return (count[R-1][C-1])%MOD;
}
int main()
{
	int m,n,p;
	int p1,p2;
	cin>>m>>n>>p;
	vector<int> row(n,1);
	vector< vector<int> > mat(m,row);
	
	for(int i=0;i<p;i++)
	{
	cin>>p1>>p2;
	mat[p1-1][p2-1]=0;
	}


	
	cout<<countpath(mat,m,n)<<endl;
	
}
